Blocks

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • Blocks.Block

  • public class Block
extends java.lang.Object
    A Block is a collection of Square objects that together form a playable block/tile.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Block(Square[][] shape)
      Creates a Block with the given Square[][].

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Block

        public Block(Square[][] shape)
      throws IncorrectBlockDefinitionException
        Creates a Block with the given Square[][].
        Parameters:
        shape - the Square[][] representing the shape of the Block
        Throws:
        IncorrectBlockDefinitionException - if the Block is not defined correctly, i.e. it is not in a rectangular Square[][]
